step1.title: Welcome to your new wallet!
step1.content1: To use the blockchain, you need a wallet! Some actions cost Ether (ETH).
step1.content2: We'll show you how to buy ETH, or you can request some from a friend.

step2.title: Your Accounts
step2.content1: This is your first account, total value, and its unique public address (0x...).
step2.content2: You can create multiple accounts within this wallet by tapping on the profile icon.

step3.title: Edit Account Name
step3.content1: Why not give your account a memorable and distinct name?

step4.title: Main Menu
step4.content1: You can access Transaction history, Settings, and Support from this menu.
step4.content2: You can take more actions with your accounts & access MetaMask settings.

step5.title: Explore the Browser
step5.content1: You can explore web3 using the browser

step6.title: Search
step6.content: Search for sites, or type a URL if you know where you’re headed.

step1.title: Welcome to your wallet!
step1.content1: On the blockchain, you need a wallet (and maybe some ETH). So let’s take a look at how to use your MetaMask wallet.

step2.title: Your accounts
step2.content1: This is your account and unique public address (0x...). Create more accounts by tapping the arrow icon.

step3.title: Managing your account
step3.content1: Edit your account name, view transactions on Etherscan, share your public key, and see your private key by tapping this icon

step4.title: Notifications
step4.content1: Stay in the loop on what's happening in your wallet

step5.title: Using your wallet
step5.content1: Buy, send, swap, and receive assets by tapping this icon

step6.title: Exploring web3
step6.content1: Open the browser by tapping this icon

step7.title: Using the browser
step7.content1: Search for sites by keyword or enter a URL. Have fun out there!

leverage.title: Leverage
leverage.content: Leverage lets you trade with more than you put in. It can boost your profits, but also your losses. The higher the leverage, the riskier the trade.

liquidation_price.title: Liquidation price
liquidation_price.content: If the price hits this point, you'll be liquidated and lose your margin. Higher leverage makes this more likely.

liquidation_distance.title: Liquidation distance
liquidation_distance.content: The percentage the price needs to move against your position before liquidation. A higher percentage means more room before liquidation.

margin.title: Margin
margin.content: Margin is the money you put in to open a trade. It acts as collateral, and it's the most you can lose on that trade.

fees.title: Fees
fees.content: Trading fees are charged when you open or close a position.

estimated_pnl.title: Estimated P&L
estimated_pnl.content: Your estimated profit or loss when closing this position at the current market price. This is calculated based on your entry price and includes the portion of the position you're closing.

limit_price.title: Limit Price
limit_price.content: The specific price at which your limit order will execute. For closing long positions, the order executes when the price rises to this level. For closing short positions, it executes when the price falls to this level.

open_interest.title: Open interest
open_interest.content: The combined value of all open positions for this perp.

funding_rate.title: Funding rate
funding_rate.content: An hourly fee paid between traders to keep prices in line with the market. If the rate is positive, longs pay shorts. If negative, shorts pay longs.

oracle_price.title: Oracle price
oracle_price.content: The median of external prices reported by validators, used for computing funding rate.

funding_payments.title: Funding payments
funding_payments.content: This is the amount you've paid in funding fees since the position was opened. Funding is paid or received every hour to keep the perp price close to the actual token price.

geo_block.title: Perps unavailable in your region
geo_block.content: Perps trading isn't available in your location due to local restrictions or sanctions.

receive.title: Receive
receive.content: The amount of USDC you'll receive in your wallet after withdrawal. You'll receive USDC on the Arbitrum network.

withdrawal_fees.title: Provider Fee
withdrawal_fees.content: A flat fee charged by the provider on each withdrawal.

tp_sl.title: Take Profit & Stop Loss
tp_sl.content: Take Profit (TP) automatically closes your position when you reach your target profit. Stop Loss (SL) limits your losses by closing your position if the price moves against you.

close_position_you_receive.title: Receive amount
close_position_you_receive.content: Your receive amount is estimated and may change slightly due to slippage.

notifications.title: Turn on notifications
notifications.description: Get notified about important perps trading events like order fills, liquidations, and market updates.

tpsl_count_warning.title: Multiple TP/SL orders are active
tpsl_count_warning.content: To set TP/SL for the whole position, cancel your existing TP/SL orders first.

points.title: Points
points.content: Points are how you earn MetaMask Rewards for completing transactions, like when you swap, bridge, or trade perps.

market_hours.title: Market hours
market_hours.content: You're trading within regular market hours (9:30 am to 4pm ET). When markets are closed, there's risk for wider spreads, price moves, and higher funding rates.

after_hours_trading.title: After-hours trading
after_hours_trading.content: You're trading outside of regular market hours (9:30 am to 4pm ET). When markets are closed, there's risk for wider spreads, price moves, and higher funding rates.

what_are_perps.title: What are perps?
what_are_perps.description: MetaMask now supports perpetual futures—aka perps—letting you trade on a token's price movement without buying it.
what_are_perps.subtitle: Here's how it works.

go_long_or_short.title: Go long or short on a token
go_long_or_short.description: Pick a token to long or short, then set your order size.
go_long_or_short.subtitle: Go long to profit if the price goes up. Go short to profit if the price goes down.

choose_leverage.title: Choose your leverage
choose_leverage.description: Leverage amplifies both gains and losses. With 40x leverage, a 1% price move equals a 40% gain or loss on your margin.

watch_liquidation.title: Watch out for liquidation
watch_liquidation.description: You’ll lose your entire margin if the token hits your liquidation price. Higher leverage means less room to liquidation.

close_anytime.title: Close any time
close_anytime.description: Exit whenever you want. You’ll get back your margin, plus profits or minus losses.

ready_to_trade.title: Ready to trade?
ready_to_trade.description: Fund your perps account with any token and make your first trade in seconds.
ready_to_trade.footer_text: MetaMask will swap your funds to USDC on Arbitrum, and deposit them onto HyperCore for no added fee.

phishing.intro: is currently on the MetaMask domain warning list. This means that based on information available to us, MetaMask believes this domain could currently compromise your security and, as an added safety feature, MetaMask has restricted access to the site. To override this, please read the rest of this warning for instructions on how to continue at your own risk.
phishing.reasons: There are many reasons sites can appear on our warning list, and our warning list compiles from other widely used industry lists. Such reasons can include known fraud or security risks, such as domains that test positive on the
phishing.list_content: Domains on these warning lists may include outright malicious websites and legitimate websites that have been compromised by a malicious actor.
phishing.to_read_more: To read more about this site
phishing.review_on_etherscam: please review the domain on Etherscam.
phishing.warning: Note that this warning list is compiled on a voluntary basis. This list may be inaccurate or incomplete. Just because a domain does not appear on this list is not an implicit guarantee of that domain's safety. As always, your transactions are your own responsibility. If you wish to interact with any domain on our warning list, you can do so by
phishing.file_an_issue_intro: If you think this domain is incorrectly flagged or if a blocked legitimate website has resolved its security issues,
phishing.metamask_flagged_site: MetaMask flagged the site you're trying to visit as potentially deceptive. Attackers may trick you into doing something dangerous.
phishing.but_please_do_so_at_your_own_risk: but please do so at your own risk.

step_1.title: Before you purchase {{ticker}}, understand gas fees
step_1.subtitle_1: If you plan to swap or transfer your {{ticker}}, purchase extra to cover gas fees.
step_1.subtitle_2: Gas fees for transactions are separate from the cost of purchasing {{ticker}}.
step_1.subtitle_3: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.

step_2.title: What are gas fees?
step_2.subtitle_1: Gas powers transactions on the Ethereum network. It’s a fee paid in {{ticker}} to the crypto miners who process your transactions.
step_2.subtitle_2: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.

step_3.title: How much do I need?
step_3.subtitle_1: Gas fees fluctuate based on network traffic and type of transaction.
step_3.subtitle_2: A complex transaction like “swapping” may cost 5x - 10x more than a “send” transaction.
step_3.subtitle_3: The best way to estimate gas fees is to
step_3.subtitle_5: and see how much gas costs.

learn_more.title: How should I choose?
learn_more.intro: Selecting the right gas fee depends on the type of transaction and how important it is to you.
learn_more.aggressive_text: High probability, even in volatile markets. Use Aggressive to cover surges in network traffic due to things like popular NFT drops.
learn_more.market_text: Use Market for fast processing at current market price.
learn_more.low_text: Use Low to wait for a cheaper price. Time estimates are much less accurate as prices are somewhat unpredictable.

edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_low: Max Priority Fee is low for current network conditions
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_high: Max Priority Fee is higher than necessary
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_speed_up_low: Max Priority Fee must be at least {{speed_up_floor_value}} GWEI (10% higher than initial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_cancel_low: Max Priority Fee must be at least {{cancel_value}} GWEI (50% higher than initial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_low: Max Fee is low for current network conditions
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_high: Max Fee is higher than necessary
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_speed_up_low: Max Fee must be at least {{speed_up_floor_value}} GWEI (10% higher than initial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_cancel_low: Max Fee must be at least {{cancel_value}} GWEI (50% higher than initial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_gas_limit: Gas limit is the maximum units of gas you are willing to use. Units of gas are a multiplier to “Max priority fee” and “Max fee”.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_max_priority_fee: Max priority fee (aka “miner tip”) goes directly to miners and incentivizes them to prioritize your transaction. You’ll most often pay your max setting.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_max_fee: The max fee is the most you’ll pay (base fee + priority fee).
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_new_gas_fee: We have updated the gas fee based on current network conditions and have increased it by at least 10% (required by the network).
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_cancel_gas_fee: We have updated the gas fee based on current network conditions and have increased it by at least 50% (required by the network).
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.low_fee_warning: Take note of your processing time. Future transactions will queue after this one.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_gas_limit_legacy: Gas limit is the maximum units of gas you are willing to use. Units of gas are a multiplier to “Gas price”.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_gas_price: This network requires a “Gas price” field when submitting a transaction. Gas price is the maximum amount you are willing to pay per unit of gas.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.gas_price_low: Gas price is low for current network conditions
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.gas_price_high: Gas price is higher than necessary

srp_security_quiz.title: Security quiz
srp_security_quiz.introduction: To reveal your Secret Recovery Phrase, you need to correctly answer two questions

question_one.question: If you lose your Secret Recovery Phrase, MetaMask...
question_one.wrong_answer: Can get it back for you
question_one.right_answer_title: Right! No one can help get your Secret Recovery Phrase back
question_one.right_answer_description: Write it down, engrave it on metal, or keep it in multiple secret spots so you never lose it. If you lose it, it’s gone forever.
question_one.wrong_answer_title: Wrong! No one can help get your Secret Recovery Phrase back
question_one.wrong_answer_description: If you lose your Secret Recovery Phrase, it’s gone forever. No one can help you get it back, no matter what they might say.

question_two.question: If anyone, even a support agent, asks for your Secret Recovery Phrase...
question_two.right_answer_title: Correct! Sharing your Secret Recovery Phrase is never a good idea
question_two.right_answer_description: Anyone claiming to need your Secret Recovery Phrase is lying to you. If you share it with them, they will steal your assets.
question_two.wrong_answer: You should give it to them
question_two.wrong_answer_title: Nope! Never share your Secret Recovery Phrase with anyone, ever
question_two.wrong_answer_description: Anyone claiming to need your Secret Recovery Phrase is lying to you. If you share it with them, they will steal your assets.

default_settings.manage_networks_body: We use Infura as our remote procedure call (RPC) provider to offer the most reliable and private access to Ethereum data we can. You can choose your own RPC, but remember that any RPC will receive your IP address and Ethereum wallet to make transactions. Read our
default_settings.manage_networks_body2: to learn more about how Infura handles data for EVM accounts, for Solana accounts
default_settings.functionality_body: MetaMask offers basic features like token details and gas settings through internet services. When you use internet services, your IP address is shared, in this case with MetaMask. This is just like when you visit any website. MetaMask uses this data temporarily and never sells your data. You can use a VPN or turn off these services, but it may affect your MetaMask experience. Read our

bridge.price_impact_info_description: Price impact reflects how your swap order affects the market price of the asset. It depends on the trade size and the available liquidity in the pool. MetaMask does not influence or control price impact.

If you don't hold enough funds for gas, part of your source token is automatically allocated to cover fees, which increases price impact. MetaMask does not influence or control price impact.

Earn points for your activity. 
Advance through levels to unlock rewards.
onboarding.step1_description: Every swap and perps trade you make in MetaMask gets you closer to rewards. Add your accounts and watch your points add up.

onboarding.step3_description: Each season brings new perks. Join in, compete, and claim what you can before time runs out.

optout.title: Opt out of Rewards
optout.description: This will remove your accounts from the Rewards program and erase your points and progress. You won't be able to undo this.

modal.confirmation_description: This will remove all your progress, and can't be reversed. If you rejoin the Rewards program later, you'll start back at 0.

active_account.title: Don't miss out
active_account.description: Add your account to start earning points from your activity.

multiple_unlinked_accounts.title: Start earning points
multiple_unlinked_accounts.description: Add your accounts so you can track your rewards at a glance.

account_not_supported.title: Account not supported
account_not_supported.description_hardware: Hardware wallet accounts are not yet eligible to earn points. Please switch to a different account to proceed.
account_not_supported.description_general: Currently only non-hardware internal Ethereum and Solana accounts are eligible to earn points. Please switch to a different account to proceed.

sheet.title: Swap tokens
sheet.description: Swap tokens on supported networks to earn points for every dollar you trade.

sheet.title: Trade perps
sheet.description: Earn points on every trade, including opens and closes, stop loss and take profit orders, and margin adjustments. Order value is based on the size with leverage. If you have a fee discount, points will be discounted too.

sheet.title: Loyalty bonus
sheet.description: Add accounts with past MetaMask in-wallet swaps or bridges to earn loyalty bonuses. Each eligible account unlocks points in increments of 250, up to a total of 50,000. Bonuses appear shortly after you add an account.

sheet.title: Prediction markets
sheet.description: Earn points on every $10 you trade.

sheet.title: MetaMask Card
sheet.description: Earn points every time you use your MetaMask Card for purchases, plus 1% cash back (3% for Metal cardholders).

sheet.title: Deposit mUSD
sheet.description: Earn points on every $100 mUSD you deposit.

sheet.title: Hold mUSD
sheet.description: Earn points on every $100 mUSD you hold.

info.title: Share your code to earn more
info.description: Your friends get a 2x sign up bonus. You get 10 points for every 50 they earn from trading.
